parameterdescription.para:
reset flag for CAN controller
true reset the CAN controller
false clear the CAN controller reset flag

briefdescription.para: Force CAN controller to Bus-off mode.

parameterdescription.para:
CAN loopback mode
can_mode_normal Normal work mode
can_mode_loopback_internal internal loopback mode
can_mode_loopback_external external loopback mode
can_mode_listen_only CAN listen-only mode

CAN listen-only mode enable flag
true enable listen-only mode
false disable listen-only mode

Can standby mode enable flag
true enable standby mode
false disable standby mode

briefdescription.para: Disable the re-transmission for the primary transmission buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Flag for disabling re-transmission for PTB

briefdescription.para: Check whether re-transmission is disabled for PTB or not.

simplesect.para: true Re-transmission is disabled for PTB
false Re-transmission is enabled for PTB

briefdescription.para: Disable the re-transmission for the secondary transmission buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Flag for disabling re-transmission for STB

briefdescription.para: Check whether re-transmission is disabled for STB or not.

simplesect.para: true Re-transmission is disabled for STB
false Re-transmission is enabled for STB

parameterdescription.para:
CAN secondary transmit buffer selection flag
true Select the secondary transmit buffer
false Select the primary transmit buffer

briefdescription.para: Start CAN high priority message transmit.
Abort CAN high priority message transmit.
Switch to next CAN tx buffer.
Select CAN tx buffer priority mode.

parameterdescription.para:
CAN tx buffer priority mode selection flag
true priority decision mode
false FIFO mode

briefdescription.para: Get CAN secondary transmit buffer status.

parameterdescription.para: transmit buffer status, 0: empty, 1: <= 1/2 full, 2: > 1/2 full, 3: full

briefdescription.para: Check whether the primary transmit buffer is full.
Check whether the secondary transmit buffer is full.

inbodydescription.para: < CAN Secondary Transmit buffer is full

briefdescription.para: Check whether the CAN is in BUS off mode.

parameterdescription.para: Self-ack enable flag, true or false

briefdescription.para: Set CAN receive buffer overflow mode.

parameterdescription.para:
receive buffer overflow mode option
true the oldest message will be overwritten
false the new message will not be stored

briefdescription.para: Check whether CAN receive buffer is overflow.
Allow can store all date in receive buffer.

parameterdescription.para: flag to determine whether to store error data frame
buffer status, 0: empty, 1: > empty, < almost full, 2: >= almost full, 3: full

briefdescription.para: Check whether there are data available in receive buffer.

simplesect.para: true if the receive buffer is not empty

briefdescription.para: Get CAN last arbitrary lost position.
Configure the Slow Speed Bit timing using low-level interface.
Configure the Fast Speed Bit timing using low-level interface.

memberdef.argsstring: (CAN_Type *base, can_bit_timing_option_t option, uint32_t src_clk_freq, uint32_t baudrate, uint16_t samplepoint_min, uint16_t samplepoint_max)
memberdef.name: can_set_bit_timing

briefdescription.para: Configure the CAN bit timing for CAN BUS.

parameterdescription.para: Minimum Sample point, range(0-1000), samplepoint_min / 1000 will be used in calculation
Maximum Sample point, range(0-1000), samplepoint_max / 1000 will be used in calculation

memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t src_clk_freq, can_bit_timing_option_t option, uint32_t baudrate, uint16_t samplepoint_min, uint16_t samplepoint_max, can_bit_timing_param_t *timing_param)

briefdescription.para: Calculate the CAN bit timing for CAN BUS.

Maximum Sample point, range(0-1000), samplepoint_max / 1000 will be used in calculation
